item.title: Smiling AC1900 (24×8) Wi-Fi Cable Modem
item.dc:creator: techno
item.description:
• CUJO smart firewall brings business-level Internet security to protect all of your home devices
  • Internet Security: Guard your network and smart devices against hacks, malware, and cyber threats
  • Mobile App: Monitor your wired and wireless network activity with a sleek iPhone or Android app
  • CUJO connects to your wireless router with an ethernet cable. CUJO is not compatible with Luma and does not support Google Wifi Mesh. CUJO works with Eero in Bridge mode.

The post Smiling AC1900 (24×8) Wi-Fi Cable Modem appeared first on technoMarket.
item.content:encoded:
• CUJO smart firewall brings business-level Internet security to protect all of your home devices
  • Internet Security: Guard your network and smart devices against hacks, malware, and cyber threats
  • Mobile App: Monitor your wired and wireless network activity with a sleek iPhone or Android app
  • CUJO connects to your wireless router with an ethernet cable. CUJO is not compatible with Luma and does not support Google Wifi Mesh. CUJO works with Eero in Bridge mode.
  • Service: Get a 180 day service trial with purchase. $8.99/month thereafter
  • Requirements for setup: Apple or Android smartphone, Internet service, router. Please Note: Kindly refer the Installation Video and the User Guide before use which is highly essential.

The post Smiling AC1900 (24×8) Wi-Fi Cable Modem appeared first on technoMarket.

item.title: S100 Wireless Bluetooth Speaker – Neon Green
item.dc:creator: techno
item.description:
• Advanced audio performance with a compact design
  • Anti-clipping function for loud and distortion free music
  • Wireless music streaming via Bluetooth
  • Audio-in for easy connection to almost any electronic device
  • Built-in rechargeable battery for music playback anywhere

The post S100 Wireless Bluetooth Speaker – Neon Green appeared first on technoMarket.
item.content:encoded:
Hear It Loud and Better

The Philips BT-50A/00 2.1 Wireless Bluetooth Speaker (Green/Yellow) are ideal to playback high volume and distortion-free music with its salient Anti-Clipping functionality. You can enjoy a high grade acoustic quality with crisp, clear sound for even the loudest of your tracks. Whatever be the remaining battery status in your BT-50A/00 2.1 Wireless Bluetooth Speaker, it accepts input signals between 300 mV-1000 mV to give you audio without any intrusions or scattering. Your musical highs remain within the proximity of the Wireless Bluetooth Speaker’s amplifier-range to effectively avoid post-clipping interference with sound letting you listen distortion-free loudness.
No More Messy Cables

Make simple Bluetooth connections with your smartphone, tab, MP3, PC and other audio systems without any fuss of tangles and cords. Ideal to play your music when on the fly, the BT-50A/00 2.1 Wireless Bluetooth Speaker is light weight and compact for enhanced ease of carriage. With its built-in rechargeable battery, the Wireless Bluetooth Speaker provides you with substantial periods of active run.
Arresting Colours

Available in vivid black, white/grey, green/yellow and red/grey colour versions, the BT-50A/00 2.1 Wireless Bluetooth Speaker complement your style. The modish look and the cylinder-like shape fascinates you and makes the Wireless Bluetooth Speaker your perfect music partner.

The post S100 Wireless Bluetooth Speaker – Neon Green appeared first on technoMarket.

item.content:encoded:

We quote maximum battery life as stated by the manufacturer. Some machines may achieve substantially less whilst running demanding applications. Pictures are for illustration only.A Certified Refurbished product has been refurbished, tested and certified to look and work like new.

item.title: Touch 2-in-1 Laptop Intel i7-7500U, 8GB Ram
item.dc:creator: techno
item.description:
• Processor: Intel Core i7-6500U with Intel HD Graphics 520 (2.5 GHz, up to 3.1 GHz, 4 MB cache, 2 cores) with Intel Turbo Boost Technology
  • 256 GB M.2 SSD storage, 8 GB DDR3L-1600 SDRAM, 802.11ac (2x2) and Bluetooth 4.0 combo wireless, Intel HD Graphics 520, 3 USB 3.0; 1 HDMI; 1 Mini DisplayPort; 1 headphone/microphone combo
  • 13.3" diagonal FHD IPS Radiance Infinity LED-backlit touch screen (1920 x 1080) Display, Up to 12 hours battery life, Windows 10 Home 64 bit

The post Touch 2-in-1 Laptop Intel i7-7500U, 8GB Ram appeared first on technoMarket.
item.content:encoded:
It’s time to demand more from your notebook. Function meets flexibility in the elegantly designed x360. Any way you bend it, the Spectre x360 delivers. With four modes, lightning-fast performance, and impressive battery life, this convertible PC has the best of all worlds and the shortcomings of none. Distinctive versatility: Enjoy a seamless transition from notebook to tablet and everything in between, with an elegantly designed 360° hinge that lets this convertible PC look great in every position. Includes multi-format SD media card reader. HP TrueVision Full HD WVA Webcam (front-facing) with integrated dual digital microphones. Bang & Olufsen audio with 2 speakers. Full-size island-style backlit keyboard. Weight: 3.17 lb. Dimensions (W X D X H): 12.79 x 8.6 x 0.63 in

The post Touch 2-in-1 Laptop Intel i7-7500U, 8GB Ram appeared first on technoMarket.

item.title: Router Dual-band 2.4GHz 167Mbps Wi-Fi 802.11
item.dc:creator: techno
item.description:
• Supports 802.11ac standard - the next generation of Wi-Fi
  • Simultaneous 2.4GHz 300Mbps and 5GHz 433Mbps connections provide a premium wireless experience
  • Share a printer locally and files & media with networked devices or remotely via FTP server
  • Ethernet WAN (EWAN) port accepts connections from cable and fiber modems via Ethernet cable

The post Router Dual-band 2.4GHz 167Mbps Wi-Fi 802.11 appeared first on technoMarket.
item.content:encoded:
Coming with the next generation Wi-Fi standard – 802.11ac, 3 times faster than wireless N speeds in a single stream, Archer D20 delivers a combined wireless data transfer rate of up to 750Mbps with 300Mbps over 2.4GHz and 433Mbps over 5GHz. 802.11ac also brings higher power efficiency and robust security, making Archer D20 a perfect hub for your home or small office network.

The post Router Dual-band 2.4GHz 167Mbps Wi-Fi 802.11 appeared first on technoMarket.

item.title: ThinkPad Ultralight 12GB Business Ultrabook
item.dc:creator: techno
item.description:
• Processor: Intel i7-6600U Dual Core Processor (4MB Cache, 2.6GHz-3.4GHz) 15W
  • RAM: 12GB 2133MHz DDR4 | Hard Drive: 256GB Solid State Drive
  • Optical Drive: None | Operating System: Windows 7 Professional x64 through downgrade Windows 10 Professional rights
  • Graphics Card: Intel HD Graphics 520 | Display: 14-inch Full HD IPS Display (1920 x 1080)

The post ThinkPad Ultralight 12GB Business Ultrabook appeared first on technoMarket.
item.content:encoded:
The 14″ ThinkPad T460s Ultrabook from Lenovo is a thin and lightweight notebook designed for you to use on the go. It’s powered by a 2.6 GHz Intel Core i7-6600U Dual-Core processor with 8GB of DDR4 RAM that enables you to efficiently multitask and quickly access frequently used files and programs. If you need more processing power, the CPU can be adjusted to 3.4 GHz using Intel’s Turbo Boost technology.

Specifications:
Ports: 3 x USB 3.0, 1 x Mini Display , 1 x HDMI, 1 x Audio/Microphone Combo, 1 x 4-in-1 Card Reader
Wireless: 802.11 AC + Bluetooth 4.1
Operating System: Windows 10 Professional x64
Webcam: 720p Webcam
Battery: 3-Cell Lithium-Ion Battery (23Wh) + 3-Cell (26Wh)
Keyboard: Backlit Keyboard with Fingerprint Reader

The post ThinkPad Ultralight 12GB Business Ultrabook appeared first on technoMarket.

item.title: XPS 13 Laptop 6GB W10 Infinity Edge Display
item.dc:creator: techno
item.description:
• Large screen, small laptop
  • Imporved Usability
  • Premium Materials for a Stunning Design and Durability
  • Greenest XPS Laptop Ever

The post XPS 13 Laptop 6GB W10 Infinity Edge Display appeared first on technoMarket.
item.content:encoded:
Large screen, small laptop: The virtually borderless infinity Edge display cleverly fits a 13-inch display into the size of an 11-inch laptop.

Impressive screen size: The thin bezel frees up the screen space in this innovative design. The three-sided, virtually borderless infinity display measures a miniscule 5.2mm border: the thinnest frame on a notebook. With a slim bezel of less than 2% of the total display, you have more screen to love.

Thin build: Not only is the XPS 13 small, it’s also stunningly thin to make it an ideal mobile companion. At only 9-15mm thick and starting at only 2.6 pounds (1.18kg), it is easy to stick in your purse or bag while you are on the go.

The post XPS 13 Laptop 6GB W10 Infinity Edge Display appeared first on technoMarket.
